DOC.brief_summary: Proton Pump Inhibitors are no better than placebo in relieving GERD symptoms in patients with functional Heartburn.
DOC.brief_title: PPI Versus Placebo in Severe Functional Heartburn
DOC.criteria: Heartburn twice a week for at least 2 years. Normal EGD and 24hr pH study. <18yrs of age,pregnant, unable or unwilling to give consent, allergic to PPI, previous gastric or esophageal surgery, past hx of erosive GERD, unwilling or unable to stop acid suppression meds
